item.description:
December greetings to you all!!

This week in lieu of a formal incubator we'll be going to check out some of incubators themselves perform on Wednesday night at Improv Boston.

Seth and Marcos, two of our assitant organizers as well as Maria I believe have all been taking classes at Improv Boston, their "graduation shows" are on Wednesday night. The first will be at 7:30pm which will feature Seth and the rest of his class and the next will feature Marcos and Maria which will be at 9pm. I believe it's $10 total for both shows and they'll rap up around 9:30.

Afterwards we'll go out to eat like usual, I was thinkiing that lovely place there in central called The Tavern.

Come out and support our incubators. Hope to see you all there.

Rock on!

Jason J
item.how_to_find_us: Some of our peeps will be on stage.
item.name: Showtime!!!!
